comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: I don't think these statues are in the present day's Botanical Gardens in Sydney.  A pity.

comment.author: 9028007@N05
comment._content: lifeasdaddy if you enter through the Palace Garden entrance in Macquarie St, you'll come across them. They're still there (well, last time I was there about 18 months ago), although not as out in the open as in the above photo, as lots of trees/bushes have grown around many of them now.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Thanks.  I don't get there often either, but I'll go have a look soon.

comment.author: 8108294@N05
comment._content: These are replicas of the famous pair of statues by Canova, c. 1800, known as "The Boxers". See . . . ancientrome.ru/art/artworken/img.htm?id=1458
